alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 12 at 2:27AM PDT until April 13 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 29 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In Oregon, Coast Range of Northwest Oregon, Central Coast Range of Western Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. In Washington, South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures appear to briefly fall below freezing close to sunrise, however, they will stay below 35 degrees for several hours. Areas shaded from early morning sun will be slower to warm up.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills
